materials.raw_text:

 In (Indium) - Obtain from metal suppliers or specialty electronic component distributors. 
 Nd (Neodymium) - Purchase from rare earth material suppliers or chemical markets. 
 Ru (Ruthenium) - Sourced from precious metal suppliers or specialty chemical companies.
